# Epist CLI

Command Line Interface for Epist.ai.

## Installation

```bash
pip install epist-cli
```

## Usage

```bash
# Login
epist login "YOUR_API_KEY"

# Ingest Audio
epist ingest "https://example.com/podcast.mp3"

# Check Status
epist status "AUDIO_ID"

# Search
epist search "pricing model"
```
